name: 探灵笔记-古墓地宫系列：任道明-一眉道长（附送29999灵币）
detailed_description:
Tangling Notes - Ancient Cemetery Palace Series: Ren Daoming - Yimei Taochang (with 29999 Ling coins attached) contains Ling Xiaoming character - Ancient Cemetery Palace series costumes: Ren Daoming - Yimei Taochang, with 29999 Ling coins attached to the skin.



Unlock this costume to get the plot "Tomb Palace Chapter II. Yimei Dao Chang"

Half a bowl of clear water illuminates the heavens and the earth, a spiritual symbol, ghosts and gods.

Red rope sticky rice still exists today, not Shuling people.
